reporter_caption.center: NEW ENGLAND INS. CO. v. INT'L BANK, 514 So.2d 390 (Fla.App. 3 Dist. 1987)

caption.center: NEW ENGLAND INSURANCE COMPANY, APPELLANT, v. INTERNATIONAL BANK OF MIAMI,

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District.

opinion.posture: An Appeal of a non-final order from the Circuit Court of Dade County; Richard V. Feder, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Bailey, Dawes Hunt and Mercedes C. Busto, Miami, for appellant.
Finley, Kumble, Wagner, Heine, Underberg, Manley, Myerson Casey and John H. Schulte and David B. McCrea and W. Barry Blum, Miami, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before HUBBART and NESBITT and DANIEL S. PEARSON, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Affirmed. Shingleton v. Bussey, 223 So.2d 713 (Fla. 1969);North Am. Accident Ins. Co. v. Moreland, 60 Fla. 153, 53 So. 635 (1910); Bil-Jax, Inc. v. Williamson, 497 So.2d 1350 (Fla. 4th DCA 1986); Bowman v. Kingsland Dev., Inc., 432 So.2d 660 (Fla. 5th DCA 1983); Cricket Club, Inc. v. Basso, 384 So.2d 908, 909 (Fla. 3d DCA 1980); Kentucky Farm Bureau Mut. Ins. Co.v. Mills, 367 So.2d 673 (Fla. 2d DCA), cert. denied, 376 So.2d 74 (Fla. 1979); Overseas Dev., Inc. v. Dominion Mortgage Corp.,330 So.2d 845 (Fla. 3d DCA 1976), cert. denied, 342 So.2d 1103 (Fla. 1977); Winter Park Arms, Inc. v. Akerman, 199 So.2d 107 (Fla. 4th DCA 1967); Confederation of Canada Life Ins. Co. v.Vega Y Arminan, 135 So.2d 867 (Fla. 3d DCA 1961), cert. deniedwith opinion, 144 So.2d 805 (Fla. 1962).Page 391
